title: Gated community entrance, Poolside chaise lounges, Gas barbecue grills
map_address: 18179 W. Terra Verde Place near Lost Canyon
posting_body: At this time our team is available to schedule a self-guided onsite tour after a personalized virtual tour has been taken.
Please call us for more information!
Serenity Just Minutes From the City
An all-new community for families and commuters alike, The Townhomes at Lost Canyon offer luxury townhouse-style living at a relaxed Santa Clarita Valley pace.
While at home, residents will enjoy a resort-like experience with access to world-class amenities.
The resort-style pool, and spa give new definition to lazy Sunday afternoons and evening stress relief.
The conveniently located pool lounge, barbecue area, playground, and dog park make entertaining a breeze.

Townhomes will showcase spacious 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath floorplans with attached 2-car garages and high-end finishes, including designer wood plank flooring on the first level and walk-in laundry rooms on the second level.
The kitchens will evoke a chef-like ambiance with features including European-style, flat, panel cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and quartz counter tops.
Select townhomes will offer mountain views, an over-sized patio with outdoor fireplaces and a second private patio.
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1436 Sq.
- Laundry rooms with full-size GE Washers and Dryers
- Direct-access two-car garages with remote control entry
- European-style cabinetry in a chocolate finish with stainless steel bar pulls
- Gallery-style track lighting with spotlights in dining rooms
- Private master bedroom with Walk-in closets
- Separate shower and tub in master bathrooms
- Classic multi-speed ceiling fans in living rooms
- Plush desert tan carpeting in bedrooms
- Free weight, medicine ball and yoga mat selections
- Access control system with key fob controls
- Dining tables with café-style canvas umbrellas
- Online rent payment and service requests
- Covered lounging cabana with flat screen TVs
Verifiable income in the amount of 3x the rental rate is required.
18179 W. Terra Verde Place, Santa Clarita, CA, 91387
